core

Class BankAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.BankAccount

  • public class BankAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    The BankAccount class simulates several different types of bank accounts such as credit cards, savings, award savings, and checking accounts. This class contains methods that calculate interest rate and total balance of the different accounts given their interest rates.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String accountHolder 
      private java.lang.String accountNumber 
      private int accountType 
      private double balance 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BankAccount()
      The default constructor constructs a "blank" bank account with an unknown account number and unknown account holder.
      BankAccount(java.lang.String accountNumber, java.lang.String accountHolder, double balance, int accountType)
      This constructor creates a bank account using a customers information and initializes the bank accounts values using the given parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BankAccount

        public BankAccount()
        The default constructor constructs a "blank" bank account with an unknown account number and unknown account holder. It also initializes the balance to 0 and accountType to the unknown value of 0.

      • BankAccount

        public BankAccount(java.lang.String accountNumber,
                   java.lang.String accountHolder,
                   double balance,
                   int accountType)
        This constructor creates a bank account using a customers information and initializes the bank accounts values using the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - The account number identifying the account
        accountHolder - The name of the account owner
        balance - The current balance of the account
        accountType - The type of the account. Integers correspond to account types.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateTotalBalance

        public double calculateTotalBalance()
        Calculates the total balance of the account given the interest rate and the current balance.
        Returns:
        A double containing the balance of the account after the interest rate calculation

      • getInterestRate

        public double getInterestRate()
        Decides the interest rate based on the type of account. 1: Savings account .5%, 2: Award Savings 4.5%, 3: Checking, 1.0%, and 4: Credit Card, 15%. If any other account type is given then the interest rate is considered to be 0%.
        Returns:
        Returns the interest rate as a percentage.

      • getAccountNumber

        public java.lang.String getAccountNumber()
        Returns:
        bank account number

      • setAccountNumber

        public void setAccountNumber(java.lang.String accountNumber)
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - bank account number

      • getAccountHolder

        public java.lang.String getAccountHolder()
        Returns:
        account holder of bank account

      • setAccountHolder

        public void setAccountHolder(java.lang.String accountHolder)
        Parameters:
        accountHolder - account holder of bank account

      • getBalance

        public double getBalance()
        Returns:
        balance of bank account as a double

      • setBalance

        public void setBalance(double balance)
        Parameters:
        balance - balance of bank account as a double

      • getAccountType

        public int getAccountType()
        Gets account type. Any integer will work but only 1-4 are actual account types that don't default to other
        Returns:
        type of account 1-savings 2-award savings 3-checking 4-credit card

      • setAccountType

        public void setAccountType(int accountType)
        Sets account type. Any integer will work but only 1-4 are actual account types that don't default to other
        Parameters:
        accountType - Type of account 1-savings 2-award savings 3-checking 4-credit card
